notesStmt.note: Tidemarks at foot and foredge. Slight foxing in margins. Various usage stains, finger dirt, ink smears.

Folios 1-7: calendar entries for 14 years, Italian cursive script of the 17th to 18th century. Folio 90: an English description of the manuscript by Samuel Hart, written at the request of then owner, W.H. Black, in 1828. Folio 22r: an additional piece written by a later Italian hand.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
